text: City-Air was an airline based in Germany which suspended operations in February 2004 and was expected to file for insolvency. It had operated a fleet of Metroliners, Saab 340s and an ATR 42-500 on domestic routes within Germany and on several international routes to Austria, Denmark, Hungary and Switzerland. ==External links== *City-Air Category:Defunct airlines of Germany Category:Airlines established in 2000 Category:Airlines disestablished in 2004 Category:German companies disestablished in 2004 Category:German companies established in 2000
title: City-Air
